summary: Petrol pump management and inventory system with fuel sales tracking, real-time inventory monitoring, billing with multiple payment options, employee management, customer loyalty program, reporting/analytics, and advanced features including IoT integration and multi-branch support
architectural_notes: Multi-payment gateway integration required (Cash, Card, UPI, Wallet)
Real-time inventory tracking system with tank level sensors
Multi-channel notification system (SMS/WhatsApp/Email) for receipts and alerts
IoT device integration layer for smart meters and sensors
Multi-branch architecture to support centralized management
Customer-facing mobile app for location, pricing, and booking features
GST compliance and tax reporting module
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern fuel pump icon for the application logo (fuel-pump-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Dashboard hero background with abstract fuel station theme in warm earth tones (dashboard-hero.dim_1920x400.png)
- Fuel tank gauge illustration for inventory monitoring (fuel-gauge.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Implement fuel sales recording system for petrol and diesel with automatic stock deduction upon each sale transaction
Create real-time inventory monitoring showing current fuel levels in each tank with visual indicators
Implement automated re-order alert system that triggers notifications when fuel stock falls below configured threshold levels
Build billing system supporting multiple payment methods including cash, card, UPI, and wallet payments with payment tracking
Create digital receipt generation system with transaction details, fuel type, quantity, price, and payment information
Implement employee management system with shift timing records and attendance tracking functionality
Create employee sales performance reporting showing individual sales metrics and targets
Build customer loyalty program with points accumulation system based on purchase volume and value
Implement membership card management system for customer loyalty program with unique customer IDs and reward tracking
Create comprehensive reporting dashboard with daily, weekly, and monthly sales reports including fuel volumes and revenue
Implement profit and loss analysis reporting showing revenue, costs, and net profit margins
Build tax and GST reporting module calculating and displaying tax liabilities based on sales data
Create fuel price management system allowing manual updates of petrol and diesel prices that apply to future transactions
Implement emergency alert system for critical events such as fuel leakage or safety issues with prominent notifications
Build multi-branch management functionality allowing owners to manage multiple petrol pump locations from a single interface
Create pump location finder feature showing nearby petrol pumps on a map with address and distance information
Implement public fuel price display showing current petrol and diesel prices at each pump location
Build pre-booking and reservation system for large vehicle fuel orders such as trucks and buses

Design a cohesive visual theme for the petrol station management application with a professional color scheme (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography, and industry-appropriate styling that works across dashboards, reports, and customer-facing interfaces

new_feature_requests.summary: Fuel sales management with petrol/diesel sales recording and automatic stock updates
Inventory & stock monitoring with real-time tank fuel levels and re-order alerts
Billing system with cash, card, UPI, wallet payment support and digital receipts (SMS/WhatsApp/Email)
Employee management with shift timing, attendance tracking, and sales performance reports
Customer loyalty program with points/cashback system and membership cards or app-based rewards
Reporting and analytics with daily/weekly/monthly sales reports, profit/loss analysis, and tax/GST reporting
Fuel price update integration with automatic price updates
Emergency alerts for leakage or safety issues
Multi-branch management for owners with multiple pumps
IoT integration with smart meters and sensors for data collection
Customer features: nearby pump location/navigation, fuel price checking, and pre-booking/reservation for large vehicles
